resources.string: Ziggs was born with a talent for tinkering, but his true passion was for things that go BOOM! Working as an inventor\'s assistant in Piltover, he grew bored with his predictable life. Seeking excitement, he befriended Jinx, a wild, blue-haired bomber who shared his love for chaos. After a series of explosive escapades, Ziggs realized he could never be truly happy in the rigid city of Piltover. He now resides in Zaun, where his creativity and love for massive explosions can run wild without restraint, making him a true force of yordle nature.

Once a criminal from the lawless streets of Zaun, Vi is a hot-headed and impulsive woman with little respect for authority. Growing up alone, she developed finely-honed survival instincts and a wickedly abrasive sense of humor. Now working with the Wardens of Piltover, she wields powerful hextech gauntlets to maintain order. While she fights on the side of the law, her rebellious spirit and aggressive methods often put her at odds with her more straight-laced partner, Caitlyn.

Undaunted by even the most dangerous of obstacles, Teemo scouts the world with boundless enthusiasm and a cheerful spirit. A yordle with an unwavering sense of morality, he takes pride in following the Bandle Scout\'s Code, sometimes with a little too much zeal. Though he looks cute, Teemo is a deadly warrior, using his blowgun and toxic mushrooms to protect his friends and neutralize threats. Many enemies have underestimated him, a mistake they rarely live to repeat.

Taric is the Aspect of the Protector, wielding incredible power as Runeterra\'s guardian of life, love, and beauty. Once a high-ranking soldier of Demacia, he was shamed by a dereliction of duty that cost his men their lives. Exiled, he climbed the formidable Mount Targon seeking redemption, only to discover a higher calling. Now, infused with celestial power, he fights to defend the world from the corrupting influence of the Void.

Cursed from childhood to be haunted by the supernatural Black Mist, Senna joined a sacred order known as the Sentinels of Light. Alongside her husband, Lucian, she fought back against the darkness. However, she was ultimately captured by the cruel soul-collector Thresh, her soul trapped in his lantern for years. Now freed, Senna wields both light and shadow, using the very Mist that once tormented her as a weapon to redeem lost souls and end the Harrowing for good.

Hailing from a long-lost tribe of vastaya, Neeko can blend into any crowd by borrowing the appearances of others. She watches the world with wide, innocent eyes, always seeking to understand the strange customs of civilization. Her chameleon-like abilities allow her to absorb the emotional state of others, helping her distinguish friend from foe in a heartbeat. Endlessly curious and surprisingly resilient, no one is ever sure where—or who—Neeko might be next.

Imbued with the fire of the sun, Leona is a holy warrior of the Solari who defends Mount Targon with her Zenith Blade and Shield of Daybreak. Her skin shimmers with starfire, and her eyes burn with the power of the celestial Aspect within her. Chosen to be the vessel for the Aspect of the Sun, Leona brings its light to all of Runeterra, offering protection to the righteous and destruction to those who would spread darkness.

The Noxian occupation of Ionia produced many heroes, none more unlikely than young Irelia of Navori. Trained in the ancient dances of her province, she adapted her art for war when her home was threatened. Using her telekinetic powers, she levitates a host of deadly blades, turning her graceful movements into a lethal spectacle. Now a leader of the Ionian resistance, she is a symbol of defiance and hope for her people, willing to do anything to preserve their freedom.

Fizz is an amphibious yordle who dwells among the reefs surrounding Bilgewater. He often retrieves and returns the tithes cast into the sea by superstitious captains, but even the saltiest of sailors know better than to cross him. As the last of his kind, he is fiercely protective of his new home and the sea creatures within it. Armed with his trusty trident and commanding the power of the tides, this playful trickster can be a surprisingly dangerous foe.

Bearing her crescent moonblade, Diana fights as a warrior of the Lunari, a faith all but vanished from the lands around Mount Targon. Clad in shimmering armor the color of winter snow, she is a living embodiment of the silver moon’s power. Once a devout member of the sun-worshipping Solari, she was cast out for questioning their dogma. Now, she seeks to uncover the true history of her people and prove the power of the moon to a world that has forgotten it.

Dangerous, yet disarmingly precocious, Annie is a child mage with immense pyromantic power. Born in the northern wilds of Noxus, her natural affinity for fire manifested early in unpredictable, emotional outbursts. Her only companion is her beloved teddy bear, Tibbers, whom she can transform into a ferocious, fiery protector. Wandering the dark forests of Noxus, Annie remains unaware of the true extent of her powers or the dangers that seek to exploit them.
